about_the_game:
Mocha & Baksheesh brings the beloved physical board game experience to life, adding exciting new dimensions to your trading adventure.


In Mocha & Baksheesh, the Bazaar now has a new favorite: Coffee! As an astute merchant, you’ll seize the opportunity to trade this sought-after commodity. Navigate four new locations, including the bustling Tavern and the strategically essential Guild Hall, to gain additional resources and advantages.

Key Features:
  • Introduce Coffee into your trading repertoire and master its market to get Rubies.
  • Explore four new locations: the Tavern, Guild Hall, Roasting Plant and Coffee House.
  • Exchange collected resources or Lira during encounters with the Coffee Trader.
  • Perform a single action for double the profit, gain increased amounts of resources or more when using 20 unique Guild Cards.
  • Expand your card arsenal with the introduction of 9 new types of Bonus Cards.
  • Faithful to the original board game rules and design.

Join the Coffee trading frenzy, outwit your opponents, and rise to the top as the ultimate merchant in Istanbul with the Mocha & Baksheesh DLC!

Add Mocha & Baksheesh to your Wishlist now and continue your journey to fortune!
